scripts.build: tsup src/index.tsx --format esm,cjs --dts --external react --external react-dom --external @emotion/react --external @mantine/core --external @mantine/hooks --external @mantine/utils --external react-icons --external react-virtuoso --external @dashly-hooks
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.tsx --format esm,cjs --watch --dts --external react --external react-dom --external @emotion/react --external @mantine/core --external @mantine/hooks --external @mantine/utils --external react-icons --external react-virtuoso --external @dashly-hooks
